metadata.title: Easy Stuffed Whole Plantains | Pazham Nirachathu | Malabar Kerala Snack Recipe | Egg Coconut Filling
metadata.description: An absolutely delicious snack with whole plantains- coconut-egg filling stuffed into whole plantains & pan-fried. This is a Malabar-Kerala specialty snack.

en: [00:00:00.000] hey everyone welcome to cooking with
[00:00:01.000] task i love plantains
[00:00:03.000] in fact i love all the dishes that's
[00:00:05.000] made with plantain

[00:00:08.000] dishes with plantain
[00:00:10.000] plantains belong to banana family and
[00:00:12.000] it's found in abundance in kerala
[00:00:14.000] and also in other tropical countries i'm
[00:00:17.000] so glad that plantings are available at
